data.message:
I wanted to let you know I’m reporting you for FCC violations today.  😕. I reported a bunch of horrible videos involving underage content, troublesome material, violent and unacceptable content and you said it was fine.  I know it isn’t fine and I think you have an algorithm running this and not a person.  I have no choice but to report it.

In the past these videos were removed.  😡. Why not today?

And as a stockholder I’m really irritated by this.  You are going to ruin your brand not to mention expose children and victims to a lot of triggering and offensive things.

Please pay attention to flagged material.
